abstract: The default type of document content type, which is XML.
rawMarkdown:
--- source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Foundation/XMLDocument/ContentKind/xml crawled: 2025-12-07T13:26:02Z --- # XMLDocument.ContentKind.xml **Case** The default type of document content type, which is XML. ## Declaration ```swift case xml ``` ## Enumeration Cases - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.html**: Outputs empty tags in HTML without a close tag, such as `
`. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.text**: Outputs the string value of the document by extracting the string values from all text nodes. - **XMLDocument.ContentKind.xhtml**: The document output is XHTML.

items.description:
Outputs empty tags in HTML without a close tag, such as `
`.

title: XMLDocument.ContentKind.xml
